text: The BBVA Open Ciudad de Valencia is a tournament for professional female tennis players played on outdoor clay courts. The event is classified as a $60,000+H ITF Women's Circuit tournament and has been held in Valencia, Spain, since 2016. == Past finals == === Singles === {|class="wikitable" style="font- size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Varvara Gracheva || Tamara Korpatsch || 3–6, 6–2, 6–0 |- | 2018 || Paula Badosa Gibert || Aliona Bolsova Zadoinov || 6–1, 4–6, 6–2 |- | 2017 || Irina Bara || Olga Danilović || 5–7, 6–4, 6–0 |- | 2016 || Jasmine Paolini || Quirine Lemoine || 6–1, 2–6, 6–4 |} === Doubles === {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2019 || Irina Bara Rebeka Masarova || Andrea Gámiz Seone Mendez || 6–4, 7–6(7–2) |- | 2018 || Irina Khromacheva Nina Stojanović || Valentini Grammatikopoulou Renata Zarazúa || 6–1, 6–4 |- | 2017 || Cristina Bucșa Yana Sizikova || Andrea Gámiz Georgina García Pérez || 7–6(7–1), 7–6(7–5) |- | 2016 || Lina Gjorcheska Galina Voskoboeva || Alicia Herrero Liñana Ksenija Sharifova || 6–0, 6–0 |} == External links == * * ITF search Category:ITF Women's Circuit Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2016 Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Spain
title: BBVA Open Ciudad de Valencia
